title: Bug 18335 - Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
OB: When a view is maximized in a specific perspective in the workbench and the workbench is closed, upon reopening the workbench and switching back to the same perspective, the contents of the perspective are lost.
EB: The contents of the perspective should be preserved even when a view is maximized and the workbench is closed and reopened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Switch to another perspective in the workbench.
2. Exit the workbench.
3. Open the workbench again.
4. Switch to the perspective that had the view maximized.
